A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was disappointed with the way they portrayed Luke in this movie. It amounts to a character assassination.  And the way they handled Snoke's character is simply criminal --- they completely neglected to develop one of the central players in the story.  Frankly\, DON\"T WASTE YOUR MONEY.  Wait for it to be available via streaming services.  This movie was barely worth the gas I spent driving to the movie theater.  Very sad!
